title: Question 1:
description: What are the risks of depositing or withdrawing with an asset that isn't native to the vault?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: You can potentially lose 1% of your deposit and withdrawal to slippage. You also take on the risk of trusting Zapper's contracts are taking the most efficient route possible. Read here for more details: https://docs.yearn.finance/using-yearn#if-you-dont-have-the-required-token-for-the-vault-that-you-would-like-to-deposit-in
